channel.title: Not letting me run anything that uses Java
channel.description:
OK this is my new laptop and i got the new java. bt when i try like running a server client or like RSbot, stuff like that it dosnt let me it says
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
or
that "the name dose not match" something like that
PLz help!@!@!@
